name: Prison of the Dead
description:
Trouble is brewing in the depths of the necromancer's kingdom, the necromancer king has been slain and the young prince has been imprisoned by the revolutionaries. Can he escape the dungeon and gain his rightful place on the throne?

This game is a short 10-20 minute experience with mostly hack and slash gameplay but with some puzzles and other variations. It was a game I created to challenge myself since I was completely new to the Godot engine and I wanted to see what I could create. This is the result of two months of basically full-time working on the project.

If you have any feedback I would greatly appreciate if you could leave it in the comments. Thank you for playing.
